page.title: 14Loch Fitty
page.content: Loch Fitty is near the villages of Lassodie & Kingseat.You travel up the B192 road north of the village of Kingseat for a mile or so.Loch Fitty is stocked full of rainbow trout.Lots of people go fishing there and the fish mainly go for black flies.There is a small fish farm just next to the loch.Visitors going to the loch can buy fish pellets to feed the fish in the tanks.These fish are put into the loch when they are fully grown.Many people go out in a boat because the fish don't come very close to the bank.It costs quite a lot of money to fish from a boat.Every time I go I usually catch about 3 or 4 pounds of fish.
